select board_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into boardtable (board_id,board_no, userid, board_title,board_content ,board_file ) values( #{board_id},#{board_no},#{userid},#{board_title},#{board_content} ,#{board_file} )
update boardtable set board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content} where board_no=#{board_no}
delete from boardtable where board_no = #{board_no}
